summary.body: If anyone is reading a current discussion topic headed "Landmark!!", I thought I would raise this addendum topic to literally see how many Barbican images are used by the media etc, as the BA Chair suggests. Whilst doing a google search to try and find the official website of the Museum of Childhood in Bethnal Green, I came across this website with a picture of our glorious Barbican Towers! This is my "starter for 10"...
summary.subject: Sightings of the Barbican

summary.body: There's a very weird sort of skinny fox-type creature with black and brown splotches , foxshaped head and long tail, looks hairless from here, which ahs just appeared on the school site below my window. Tell me how to import a photo and I'll put one on the chat-room. Wotizzit???   [/img]
summary.subject: What on earth is this creature?

summary.body: I came across this site where people put their pictures of particular streets or places in London.  They had a section on Milton Court and I thought we might like to have the link for posterity.
summary.subject: Milton Court pics
